rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
No high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
Discusses future action/plan, not realised impact.
Segment does not contain a question.
This segment reports organization will use money to partner, a preparedness cue lacking a public safety link.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes how resources will be used ('will use the money to partner'), part of a response plan, without linking to calm/safety.
